decision_conditions:
PLANS:

392-SPSS-300-EX+GA_Elevation-South Existing + Proposed,

392-SPSS-510-DET_Detail-Gate 2 Marquess Road,
392-SPSS-512-DET_Detail-Gate 1 St Paul's Road,
392-SPSS-514-DET_ Detail-Gate 3 West,

SSK400_Proposed Structural Interventions Details 1,
SSK401_Proposed Structural Interventions Details 1 and
Structural Condition Report Boundary Wall
description: Approval of Details pursuant to Condition 6 (Landscaping - Details) of planning permission reference P2023/0343/FUL dated 11/12/2023 which sought permission for 'Proposed new landscaping and boundary works including timber built open classrooms, play structures, pond, demolition of parts of existing boundary wall for proposed gates, addition of timber acoustic fence to existing boundary walls. (A change from previously consented metal railing extension to existing boundary wall), alteration to the belowground rain water drain pipes of the School and the Hall to divert rain water run off to on-site biodiversity aquatic ponds. The proposals put forth combine some of the previously consented boundary works from (1994 (931222) & 2007 (P0714840)'.
